completed_features: Initialize the Next.js 14 project structure, install dependencies (lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge, etc.), configure strict TypeScript settings with path aliases (`@/`), and set up the Tailwind CSS configuration with the specified fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono) and design tokens.
last_commit:
feat: initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and core configuration

- Create package. with all required dependencies (lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge)
- Configure TypeScript with strict mode and @/* path aliases in tsconfig.
- Set up Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens (slate, indigo, emerald, amber, rose colors)
- Configure Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts in tailwind.config.ts
- Create folder structure per coding guidelines (app, components, contexts, hooks, lib, types)
- Implement domain models (Agent, Channel, Thread, Activity, Workspace) in types/index.ts
- Set up MockService class for simulating API endpoints with latency
- Create WorkspaceProvider context with useReducer for state management
- Add utility hooks (useKeyboard, useTheme, useMockService)
- Configure ESLint, Jest, and Playwright for testing
- Create base layout with fonts and global CSS with Tailwind directives
